clinical_study.brief_title: Bispectral Index Guiding Etomidate Used in Children Aged 3 to 10 for Clinical Anesthesia Induction

brief_summary.textblock: This research through using bispectral index to guide the induced dose and speed of etomidate lipid emulsion for pediatric total venous anesthesia,and to provide a reference for clinical anesthesia physician.

primary_outcome.time_frame: from the beginning of induction to Bispectral Index < 50,up to 5 minutes
primary_outcome.description: the amount of etomidate,propofol and sevoflurane used in anesthesia induction

primary_outcome.time_frame: from the beginning of induction to Bispectral Index < 50,expected to be within 1 minute
primary_outcome.description: the injection time of etomidate and propofol, and the inhale time of sevoflurane during anesthesia induction

primary_outcome.time_frame: from the beginning of induction to Bispectral Index < 50,up to 5 minutes
primary_outcome.description: numbers of muscular fibrillation in anesthesia induction

primary_outcome.time_frame: baseline,5 minutes after indution,5 minutes before operation end,30 mimutes、24h and 48h after operation
primary_outcome.description: serum levels of interleukin 6 and tumor necrosis factor α will be measured at each time point using ELISA method

primary_outcome.time_frame: baseline,5 minutes after indution,5 minutes before operation end,30 mimutes、24h and 48h after operation
primary_outcome.description: serum level of cortisol will be measured at each time point using radioimmunoassay

secondary_outcome.time_frame: from the beginning of induction to skin closure, up to 3 hours
secondary_outcome.description: heart rate,blood pressure,electrocardiogram and pulse oxygen saturation recorded at 4 time points including before anesthesia induction,before endotracheal intubation,after endotracheal intubation and after operation immediately

secondary_outcome.time_frame: from the beginning of induction to skin closure, up to 3 hours
secondary_outcome.description: Bispectral index,train-of-four stimulation and the temperature recorded at 4 time points including before anesthesia induction,before endotracheal intubation,after endotracheal intubation and after operation immediately

arm_group.description: infusion of etomidate at 2 minutes before anesthesia induction
infusion of propofol at 2 minutes before anesthesia induction
inhale sevoflurane for anesthesia induction and maintenance

intervention.description: intravenous injection midazolam 0.08 mg/kg, fentanyl 0.002 mg/kg, cisatracurium 0.15 mg/kg for induction of anesthesia. infusion of etomidate at 2 minutes before anesthesia induction
intravenous injection midazolam 0.08 mg/kg, fentanyl 0.002 mg/kg, cisatracurium 0.15 mg/kg for induction of anesthesia. infusion of propofol at 2 minutes before anesthesia induction
intravenous injection midazolam 0.08 mg/kg, fentanyl 0.002 mg/kg, cisatracurium 0.15 mg/kg for induction of anesthesia. inhale sevoflurane for anesthesia induction and maintenance
